localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Greg is a simple app that will coach you to grow healthy, happier plants. ⠀ Greg uses insights from plant physics to train machine learning algorithms so you know when to water each of your plants, in whichever environment they’re in.
blogPost.body: Greg is a simple app that will coach you to grow healthy, happier plants. ⠀ Greg uses insights from plant physics to train machine learning algorithms so you know when to water each of your plants, in whichever environment they’re in.
blogPost.title: Greg 🌱 - Grow healthy and happier plants
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Greg是一款简单的应用程序，它将指导你种植健康、快乐的植物。⠀ Greg利用植物物理学的见解来训练机器学习算法，这样你就能知道什么时候给你的每一株植物浇水，无论它们在什么环境中。
localize.tagline: 种植健康和快乐的植物

localize.description: Greg是一款簡單的應用程序，它將指導你種植健康、快樂的植物。⠀ Greg利用植物物理學的見解來訓練機器學習算法，這樣你就能知道什麼時候給你的每一株植物澆水，無論它們在什麼環境中。
localize.tagline: 種植健康和快樂的植物

previous.excerpt: Get inside the minds of top Product Leaders from Netflix, Amazon and Spotify with these templates covering the nine most common Product Management scenarios — presented by Product School, MURAL and Coda.
previous.title: Product Management Templates - 9 essential templates created by product leaders

localize.description: 通过这些模板进入Netflix、亚马逊和Spotify的顶级产品负责人的思维，这些模板涵盖了九种最常见的产品管理场景--由Product School、MURAL和Coda提出。
localize.tagline: 产品负责人打造的9个必备模板

localize.description: 通過這些模板進入Netflix、亞馬遜和Spotify的頂級產品負責人的思維，這些模板涵蓋了九種最常見的產品管理場景--由Product School、MURAL和Coda提出。
localize.tagline: 產品負責人打造的9個必備模板

next.title:
I'm still struggling to understand how a $10 billion family office was running their portfolio like an 18 year old YOLO trader using infinite leverage on Robinhood

It's shocking how often the "smart" money can be so dumb

localize.full_text:
我仍在努力理解一个100亿美元的家族办公室是如何像一个18岁的YOLO交易员一样，利用Robinhood的无限杠杆来管理他们的投资组合的。

令人震惊的是，"聪明 "的资金往往会如此蠢蠢欲动

我仍在努力理解一個100億美元的家族辦公室是如何像一個18歲的YOLO交易員一樣，利用Robinhood的無限槓桿來管理他們的投資組合的。

令人震驚的是，"聰明 "的資金往往會如此蠢蠢欲動
